summary: This bill, the "Providing Appropriate Recognition and Treatment Needed to Enhance Relations with ASEAN, CERN, and PIF Act," aims to extend the provisions of the International Organizations Immunities Act to the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), the European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN), and the Pacific Islands Forum (PIF). It authorizes the President to grant these organizations the same immunities and protections afforded to public international organizations in which the United States participates.
